ygData.subject: play time
ygData.msgSnippet: This in in response to the post asking of the mage playing time. Since there has been little in the way of response for the guild, I have been playing my chars
ygData.messageBody:
This in in response to the post asking of the mage playing time.
Since there has been little in the way of response for the guild, I
have been playing my chars on rodcet nife server. Once there is a
following intrest and more ppl are involved I may find more time to
play the mage, however atm it is more benificial to me to play my
char on my server with friends i already know and love. Seven more
responses and I'll have the time, but I do play between 11p-2a CST.
If you need to contact me im probably on Rodcet Nife as "Sebwin" so
if its set to get started let me know.
